Chart For Analysis Indicator/ Model Comparison LSTM + GRU (Hybrid) | | 10.794 | 116.5 | | 256.641 | 10.665 Time Fig: Chart For Analysis Indicator For Buy/ Sell/ Hold Signal. The LSTM, GRU, LSTM-GRU all Model exhibits the lowest training and testing. indicating its superior performance and making

Conclusion: Three models (GRU, LSTM, Hybrid GRU + LSTM) were proposed and tested to forecast 5-minute interval Nifty-50 index price fluctuations. The models achieved an average accuracy of 60%, correctly predicting market movements 6 out of 10 times. e The model includes a “Hold” signal, which makes up 20% of all signals, allowing for reduced risk exposure. This helps avoid unnecessary trades during volatile market conditions, preserving capital and minimizing potential losses.
